axiom\_box.name: Omega-Chi Evolution Constraint Axiom
axiom\_box.intent: Unify evolution (chi) with global semantic constraint (Omega).
axiom\_box.domain: All Box states B(chi) in the IGSOA semantic universe.
constraints: Omega(dB/dchi) is the canonical evolution vector field
Omega is applied after every chi-update
No evolution may violate Tri-Unity, polarity, mu-density, or wave-energy invariants
Chi-evolution is well-defined only inside Omega-valid state space
